historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-709.

1973 Ed., § 15-709.

DC CODE § 15-709

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia may prescribe fees and costs, including the fee to be paid for a jury trial.
Fees for services by the United States marshals for processes issued by the Superior Court shall be prescribed by rules of that court.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Fees and costs in Superior Court.
